Class Message

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Visible
public class Message
extends VisibleElement

This class creates a message that appears in the simulation at the desired location.

Since:
5.0

Constructor Detail

Message

public Message(java.lang.String text)
Creates a new Message to display the specified text. Uses a font size of 18, and a color of blue.

Parameters:
text - The String to display as a message

Message

public Message(java.lang.String text,
               int fontSize,
               int color)
Creates a new Message with the specified text size and color. If the color specified does not match one of the constants, cyan will be used.

Parameters:
